text: The Monk and the Gun is a 2023 Bhutanese Taiwanese French American Hong Kong drama movie directed by Pawo Choyning Dorji and starring Tandin Wangchuk, Kelsang Choejey, Deki Lhamo, Pema Zangmo Sherpa, Tandin Sonam, Harry Einhorn, Choeying Jatsho. == Other websites == * Category:2023 drama movies Category:Bhutanese movies Category:Taiwanese movies Category:French drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Hong Kong drama movies Category:Movies set in Bhutan Category:Movies about religion
title: The Monk and the Gun
